title: EQUALS
description: Returns TRUE if the provided value exactly matches any of the specified compare_values. The comparison is case-sensitive. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: … compare_values
parameters.description: One or more values to compare against the source value.

examples:
EQUALS("Quarterly加一个数字对比的例子", "quarterly", "financial")
-- Returns FALSE (no exact match, case-sensitive).

EQUALS(Status, "Open", "Closed")
-- Returns TRUE if Status is exactly "Open" or "Closed"; otherwise, returns FALSE.
